Package org.sat4j.tools.counting

Class ModelCounterAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sat4j.tools.counting.ModelCounterAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModelCounter
    public final class ModelCounterAdapter
extends Object
implements IModelCounter
    This class is an object adapter allowing to count the models of a formula by iterating over its models. As such, this model counter is really slow, and should only be used either on small formulas or with a low bound. Use it with caution!
    Author:
    Romain Wallon

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        public static ModelCounterAdapter newInstance​(ISolver solver)
        Creates a new ModelCounterAdapter adapting the given solver. The number of models to count is not upper bounded.
        Parameters:
        solver - The solver to adapt.
        Returns:
        The created model counter.

      • newInstance

        public static ModelCounterAdapter newInstance​(ISolver solver,
                                              long bound)
        Creates a new ModelCounterAdapter adapting the given solver.
        Parameters:
        solver - The solver to adapt.
        bound - The maximum number of models to count.
        Returns:
        The created model counter.

      • countModels

        public static BigInteger countModels​(ISolver solver)
        Counts the models of the given solver. This method is designed for convenience, so as to avoid manipulating instances of ModelCounterAdapter if only one call is needed.
        Parameters:
        solver - The solver to count the models of.
        Returns:
        The number of models of the given solver.

      • countModels

        public static BigInteger countModels​(ISolver solver,
                                     long bound)
        Counts up to bound models of the given solver. This is method is designed for convenience, so as to avoid manipulating instances of ModelCounterAdapter if only one call is needed.
        Parameters:
        solver - The solver to count the models of.
        bound - The maximum number of models to count.
        Returns:
        The number of models of the given solver.

      • setBound

        public void setBound​(long bound)
        Sets the bound for the number of models to count. A long will always be sufficient, since counting each model one by one will never allow to overflow a long.
        Parameters:
        bound - The maximum number of models to count.

      • countModels

        public BigInteger countModels()
        Description copied from interface: IModelCounter
        Computes the number of models of the underlying formula.
        Specified by:
        countModels in interface IModelCounter
        Returns:
        The number of models of the formula.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Description copied from interface: IModelCounter
        Resets this counter. This method only makes sure that counting again the models will return the same results. In particular, none of the original constraints are removed.
        Specified by:
        reset in interface IModelCounter
